entities.name: grandfather clock
entities.description: A grandfather clock lay splintered at their feet, its face cracked, its pendulum lying a little further away like a dropped sword.

entities.name: piano
entities.description: A piano was on its side, its keys strewn across the floor.

entities.name: chandelier
entities.description: The wreckage of a fallen chandelier glittered nearby.

entities.name: cushions
entities.description: Cushions lay deflated, feathers oozing from slashes in their sides;

relationships.description: Dumbledore raised his wand even higher, so that its light was thrown upon the walls,
Harryâ€™s small intake of breath made Dumbledore look round.
